title: Disney Infinity
description: Unlock the freedom to play with some of your favorite Disney and Disney/Pixar worlds like never before!  The more you play, the more you unlock so the story never ends. It’s up to you and your imagination – infinite possibilities, infinite ways to inspire your imagination!

childDownloads.title: Announce Trailer
childDownloads.description: Watch the first official trailer for Disney Infinity, an exciting new video game available in summer 2013.   Unlock the freedom to play with some of your favorite Disney and Disney/Pixar worlds like never before!  Experience adventures in the worlds of Pirates of the Caribbean, The Incredibles and Monsters University - take on the role of Sulley, the naturally gifted ‘scarer’; become Captain Jack Sparrow, the sword-wielding pirate; or transform yourself into Mr. Incredible, one of the world's greatest crime-fighters.  Battle enemies, solve puzzles, overcome obstacles and complete a variety of other unique quests.  Or create your own world!  Unlock virtual toys, characters, buildings, weapons, gadgets and more – and bring them into the Disney Infinity ‘Toy Box’ where you can mix them all up to create your own game. In the Disney Infinity Toy Box, there are no rules and you can create any adventure you want.  Share your creations with your friends with up to 4-player co-op play.  The more you play, the more you unlock so the story never ends. It’s up to you and your imagination – infinite possibilities, infinite ways to inspire your imagination!

childDownloads.title: Cars Play Set Trailer
childDownloads.description: Get the DISNEY INFINITY Cars Play Set and discover Radiator Springs, the little town with the big race, and a car that wants to wreck it all.  Complete missions, customize the stunt park, and win the big race to unlock new toys and create your own adventures in the Disney Infinity Toy Box.

childDownloads.title: Creating Disney Infinity Trailer
childDownloads.description: The first installment of this docu-series delves into the inspiration behind DISNEY INFINITY. Watch the video now!

childDownloads.title: Lone Ranger Play Set Trailer
childDownloads.description: Saddle up and ride for justice in the Lone Ranger Play Set.  Join forces with the famed masked hero John Reid and Native America warrior Tonto to rid the wild west of the lawless Cavendish gang.

childDownloads.title: Monsters University Play Set Trailer
childDownloads.description: Get the Disney Infinity Starter Pack and discover the Monsters University Play Set.  Join Sulley, Mike and Randy in their early student days on the campus of Monsters U.  Customize your own Frat Row, compete in the annual Scare Games, and watch out for pranksters from rival Fear Tech, who’s always up to no good.

childDownloads.title: Phineas and Ferb Toy Box Pack Trailer
childDownloads.description: Expand your Disney Infinity Toy Box experience with the Phineas and Ferb Toy Box Pack featuring Disney Infinity Figures for Phineas and Agent P. Use the Power Discs to customize your entire Toy Box to the world of Phineas and Ferb.

childDownloads.title: Pirates of the Caribbean Play Set Trailer
childDownloads.description: Get the DISNEY INFINITY Starter Pack and discover the Pirates of the Caribbean Play Set.  Spring a mate from jail, commandeer a ship, sail with a buccaneer crew out of Tortuga, and hunt for a series of hidden treasures.  Or create your own adventures in the Disney Infinity Toy Box, where the possibilities are endless.

childDownloads.title: Sherriff Woody Costume
childDownloads.description: Dress as a toy from Disney Infinity

childDownloads.title: Sorcerer's Apprentice Mickey Trailer
childDownloads.description: Feeling mischievous?  Join Sorcerer’s Apprentice Mickey’s spellbinding high jinks.  With his magic sweep and bursts, he’s got more moves under his Sorcerer’s hat than a wizard in a wand shop. Abracadabra!

childDownloads.title: Toy Box Character Montage
childDownloads.description: In Disney Infinity you have the freedom and endless opportunity to create stories and play experiences starring some of your favorite Disney and Disney/Pixar characters.  Expand your adventures by collecting additional characters available for the Toy Box. Check out Disney Infinity's latest lineup of figures available this Fall, including Wreck-It Ralph, Vanellope, Anna, Elsa, Rapunzel, and Jack Skellington!

childDownloads.title: Toy Box Combat Trailer
childDownloads.description: Fight the good fight in the Disney Infinity Toy Box.

childDownloads.title: Toy Box Hero Trailer
childDownloads.description: Introducing the Disney Infinity Toy Box, a wide open world of possibilities where you can mix, match and mash-up everything you unlock from the Disney Infinity Play Sets to make your own adventures, build your own worlds, and create your own games. Watch the video now!

childDownloads.title: Toy Story Play Set
childDownloads.description: Unlock the Toy Story Play Set for an all-new journey into the universe!  Buzz Lightyear’s Star Command calls for your help to save an alien town from destruction!
